Notes: A small kickable stone. It drops a single Star Bit or a Coin when hit by the player or explosions. The object automatically tries to connect to collision within 300 units.

Obj_arg0.Name: Drops Coin?
Obj_arg0.Description: If set, it will drop a single Coin when kicked. Otherwise, it will drop a Star Bit.

Obj_arg1.Name: Connector Ignores Gravity?
Obj_arg1.Description: If set, the object's down vector will be used to determine the collision to connect the object to. Otherwise, the object's gravity will be used.

Obj_arg2.Name: Don't Connect to Collision?
Obj_arg2.Description: If set, it won't connect to nearby collision.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene.

YoshiLockOnTarget.Description: This object can be targeted by Yoshi.
